EmailTemplate.description: Email with preliminary Terrain database invoice
EmailTemplate.name: Terrain Database Prelim Invoice
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this email finds you well.
We have updated your terrain DB request. Please review the attached prelim invoice and advise if any changes need to be made.
I will finalize this invoice tomorrow and once I finalize it, I cannot make changes.
If you have any questions please let us know. We appreciate your continued business.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Data Services
Account Management Representative(AMR)
email: dsa@honeywell.com
602-436-6739, option 5
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
